Mayor and Commissioners
=======================

##### Mayor J.R. Garza

###### Phone: 956-787-0006 Email: jrgarza@alamotexas.org

![Aj_edit green background file](https://alamotexas.org/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/Aj_edit-green-background-file-rezsn6sldu75e9sin9k27q2oye2v6lrseanyoojeew.jpg "Aj_edit green background file")

##### Mayor Pro Tem AJ Garcia

###### Phone: 956-787-0006 Email:

![Pete_edit green background](https://alamotexas.org/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/Pete_edit-green-background-rezsni2nnuml9lc4tefl1n8830j9qz0kfuhsg02oc8.jpg "Pete_edit green background")

##### Commissioner Pete Morales

###### Phone: 956-787-0006 Email: pmorales@alamotexas.org

Learn More

Pete Morales has been a resident of Alamo for 24 years. He is married to Janie Morales. They have two children, Pedro R. Morales and Priscilla R. Morales. During his high school years he began working for Pronto Food stores here in Alamo. After graduating from PSJA High School ’91, he continued working for Pronto. He enjoys life in Alamo and the opportunities it provides he and his family. Being active and involved in his community is important to him. He has chosen to serve where it can make a difference in the community: Alamo Lions Club Treasurer, PSJA Memorial Wolverines Quarterback Club Member, Chairman of the Alamo Citizens of the Month Committee, Commissioner of the Alamo Planning and Zoning and City of Alamo Commissioner Pl2. His most rewarding work however, was with the Alamo/San Juan Boys and Girls Club where he volunteered as a Baseball Coach and Assistant Basketball Coach, and has also volunteered with the Alamo Youth Sports Baseball League as an Assistant and Head Coach. Mr. Morales looks forward to continuing his work in Alamo to build relationships, to build business opportunities and to improve our great City of Alamo.

![Oki green background](https://alamotexas.org/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/Oki-green-background-rezsnebawihfz5hlfct2ro6dph1sw6ln3bvuiw8914.jpg "Oki green background")
